text:
Hi,
To show it, you have to turn on developer mode by adding parameter developerMode=true into address URL.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/debugging-and-errors>
You should not use HubDB for this - it's not a secure way of storing data.

Issues with a blog theme.

When I preview my blog the URL ends with: en/blog?hs_preview=
When I publish and visit the URL: <http://webite.com/en/blog|webite.com/en/blog> I get a 404
When I visit: <http://website.com/blog|website.com/blog> I see the old blog without the published updates.

What is going on here?
Hi <@UQERM7BLY> Ok, thank you. What should I do next?
I’ve seen the ame issue with previews, we don’t use any language localisation but for some reason /en/ is added to preview URLs.
